trees.panel.style

Class Size

  • java.lang.Object
    • trees.panel.style.Size
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fixed, MaxVariable, MinVariable, RestrictedVariable, Variable

    public abstract class Size
extends java.lang.Object
    Possible size values for nodes. Basically sizes may be fixed or variable with possible upper and lower bounds. For a fixed size the node label is adjusted to the size. For a variable size the node is adjusted to the label.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

      Checks if the size has upper bounds.
      abstract boolean hasMinimum()
      Checks if the size has lower bounds.
      abstract boolean isFixed()
      Checks if the size is fixed.
      boolean isVariable()
      Checks if the size is variable.

      Factory method for creating a variable size with upper bounds.

      Factory method for creating a variable size with lower bounds.

      • FIXED

        public static Fixed FIXED(int width,
          int height)
        Factory method for creating a fixed size.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the node (as pixels).
        height - Height of the node (as pixels).
        Returns:
        A new Fixed-size-object

        Factory method for creating a variable size.

                       int maxHeight)
        Factory method for creating a variable size with upper bounds.
        Parameters:
        maxWidth - Maximum width of the node (as pixels).
        maxHeight - Maximum height of the node (as pixels).
        Returns:
        A new MaxVariable-size-object

      • MIN_VARIABLE

        public static MinVariable MIN_VARIABLE(int minWidth,
                       int minHeight)
        Factory method for creating a variable size with lower bounds.
        Parameters:
        minWidth - Minimum width of the node (as pixels).
        minHeight - Minimum height of the node (as pixels).
        Returns:
        A new MinVariable-size-object

      • RESTRICTED_VARIABLE

        public static RestrictedVariable RESTRICTED_VARIABLE(int minWidth,
                                     int minHeight,
                                     int maxWidth,
                                     int maxHeight)
        Factory method for creating a variable size with upper and lower bounds.
        Parameters:
        minWidth - Minimum width of the node (as pixels).
        minHeight - Minimum height of the node (as pixels).
        maxWidth - Maximum width of the node (as pixels).
        maxHeight - Maximum height of the node (as pixels).
        Returns:
        A new RestrictedVariable-size-object
